q: What does a red octagon-shaped sign indicate?
What should you do when approaching a flashing yellow traffic signal?
options: Slow down and proceed with caution
Speed up to clear the intersection

q: What is the legal BAC limit for drivers over 21 in Tennessee?
When are you required to use your headlights?
options: From sunset to sunrise or during limited visibility

q: What should you do if you miss your exit on the interstate?
What does a yellow diamond-shaped sign signify?
When can you legally pass another vehicle on the right?
options: When the vehicle ahead is making a left turn

q: What does a solid white line on the right edge of the road mean?
How far ahead should you signal before making a turn?
options: Only when other vehicles are near

q: If your vehicle begins to skid, what should you do?
options: Steer in the direction you want the front wheels to go
